main event: An oval object was reported drifting erratically over Myattsville, Maryland in 1950.
interesting points: The object emitted a luminous color with red and blue lights attached., It was visible for around 33 minutes and made short rapid movements., Observers used binoculars to view the object., Both Andrews AFB and Washington National Airport reported negative radar contact during the sighting., Weather conditions were reported as clear during the observation.
witness description: Observers Mr. and Mrs. from Hyattsville, MD
